title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat interface, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI helper for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with GPUs, WebUI, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector support.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express middleware that exposes an OpenAI-compatible completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template that wraps Ollama with authentication, rate-limiting, and usage analytics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing an async client for the Ollama HTTP API with tokio.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that talks to Ollama, including session memory and model selector widgets.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single docker-compose.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.
